HTMLTimeElement.summary: The HTMLTimeElement interface provides special properties (beyond the regular interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating {{HTMLElement("time")}} elements.

remarks.para: -The HTML element implementing this interface: time.

HTMLTimeElementDateTime.summary:
The
dateTime
property of the interface is a string that reflects the datetime HTML attribute, containing a machine-readable form of the element's date and
time value.
HTMLTimeElementDateTime.value: A string. For valid string formats, see the datetime valid values.
